Working with the Label Pane

When you select an item on the upper pane and click the Label tab, all revisions of the item display in tree format in the lower pane, along with the date and time they were created. By double-clicking a revision tree, you can see all labels attached to the revision as children of the revision. The type of label (view or revision) appears in brackets ahead of the label name.  

Operations that can be performed on the Label pane include:

Move label

A label can be moved from one revision to another by dragging and dropping. However, a label cannot be attached to more than one revision of the same item at the same time.

Review label properties

Double-clicking a label displays its properties, which include the label name, its description, and whether it has been frozen or not.

Using the Label Context Menu

The Label context menu appears when you right-click a revision or label on the Label pane. Options available on the Label context menu include:

Properties

Display all properties of  the selected label.

Attach...

Attach an existing label to the selected revision.

Detach...

Detach the selected label.

Expand All

Show all labels in all revision trees.

Collapse All

Hide all labels in all revision trees
